com.hms_networks.americas.sc.taginfo
Class TagInfoManager

java.lang.Object
  com.hms_networks.americas.sc.taginfo.TagInfoManager
public class TagInfoManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class that allows the retrieval of tag information of an Ewon Flexy by generating an export block descriptor call and parsing the response to store as a list of TagInfo objects.

Since:
1.0
Author:
HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

Field Detail

tagInfoList

private static TagInfo[] tagInfoList
Tag information list. Contents are generated/populated by a call to refreshTagList().

tagInfoListInsertIndex

private static int tagInfoListInsertIndex
The current index for inserting tag information objects into the tag information list. This index also doubles also a tracker for the tag information list actual size.

The lowest tag ID seen during the previous call to refreshTagList().

Method Detail

refreshTagList

public static void refreshTagList()
                           throws java.io.IOException
Populate the tag information list by using an Ewon Export Block Descriptor and parsing the response.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if EDB fails

processTagListEBDLine

private static void processTagListEBDLine(byte[] line)
Parse the specified line from the tag information EBD data generated in refreshTagList(). Add the parse tag information to the tag information list.

convertStrToBool

private static boolean convertStrToBool(java.lang.String stringBool)
Convert a string boolean ("0"/"1") to boolean.

getTagInfoList

public static java.util.List getTagInfoList()
Gets the tag info list populated by calling refreshTagList(). If this method is called before refreshTagList(), an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Returns:
populated tag information list

getTagInfoListFiltered

public static java.util.List getTagInfoListFiltered(java.util.List tagGroups)
Gets a filtered tag info list containing only tags from the tag info list that are in the specified tag group(s). If this method is called before refreshTagList(), an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Parameters:
tagGroups - tag groups to include
Returns:
filtered tag information list

isTagInfoListPopulated

public static boolean isTagInfoListPopulated()
Get a boolean value representing if the tag info list has been populated by calling refreshTagList().

Returns:
